title: Incorrect 'Build' Popup Action Enablement
OB: The issue is not clearly specified in the bug report.
EB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu should only be enabled if a manual build is required. Currently, it is always enabled even when the build is already done automatically.
SR: Ensure that the 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is enabled only when a manual build is needed.
